languages.text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Я проинформирую Судового стюарда о необходимости выделить надежный трюм для ваших находок, а также о надлежащей и молчаливой охране, требующейся им".

traits.locale_text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Я проинформирую Судового стюарда о необходимости выделить надежный трюм для ваших находок, а также о надлежащей и молчаливой охране, требующейся им".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Я проинформирую Судового стюарда о необходимости выделить надежный трюм для ваших находок, а также о надлежащей и молчаливой охране, требующейся им".

traits.locale_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries and an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'informerai l'intendant du vaisseau qu'il doit préparer un espace de stockage adapté pour recevoir vos découvertes, ainsi qu'une escouade de gardiens armés, bien entraînés et discrets pour veiller sur elles. »
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'informerai l'intendant du vaisseau qu'il doit préparer un espace de stockage adapté pour recevoir vos découvertes, ainsi qu'une escouade de gardiens armés, bien entraînés et discrets pour veiller sur elles. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。我会通知舰长总管，让他为您的发现提供安全的储藏空间，同时派遣一队作风谨慎、训练有素的武装看守人员来保护它们。”
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。我会通知舰长总管，让他为您的发现提供安全的储藏空间，同时派遣一队作风谨慎、训练有素的武装看守人员来保护它们。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Wird erledigt, Lord Captain. Ich informiere den Truchsess des Schiffs, dass sie einen ein sicheren Lagerraum für Eure Entdeckungen sowie einen bewaffneten Trupp diskreter und gut ausgebildeter Wachen bereitstellen sollen."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."

traits.locale_text: "Wird erledigt, Lord Captain. Ich informiere den Truchsess des Schiffs, dass sie einen ein sicheren Lagerraum für Eure Entdeckungen sowie einen bewaffneten Trupp diskreter und gut ausgebildeter Wachen bereitstellen sollen."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Informaré al administrador de la nave de que necesita espacio de almacenamiento para sus hallazgos, así como un grupo armado de guardianes discretos y bien entrenados para protegerlos».
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Informaré al administrador de la nave de que necesita espacio de almacenamiento para sus hallazgos, así como un grupo armado de guardianes discretos y bien entrenados para protegerlos».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「了解です、ロード・キャプテン。船の給仕に声をかけて、発見した物を安全に保管するスペースと、それを守る注意深くて腕の立つ兵士の武装部隊が必要だと知らせます」
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."

traits.locale_text: 「了解です、ロード・キャプテン。船の給仕に声をかけて、発見した物を安全に保管するスペースと、それを守る注意深くて腕の立つ兵士の武装部隊が必要だと知らせます」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan. Geminin idarecilerinin, keşfettiğiniz şeyler için depo alanı ayırmasını sağlayacak ve onları koruması için ağzı sıkı ve iyi eğitimli dizdarlardan oluşan, silahlı bir ekip göndereceğim."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain, I will inform the ship's steward about the need to provide a secure storage space for your discoveries as well as an armed squad of discreet and well-trained wardens to protect them."
